properties.title: Women continue to dance to horn's music
properties.abstract: Women continue to dance to horn's music. May be mourners on their way to ex-speaker's funeral to sympathize with bereaved family.

properties.title: Children dancing in front of a hut.
properties.abstract: Children dancing in front of a hut as an adult female looks on.

properties.title: Mourners dancing at funeral
properties.abstract: Male dancers in a funeral performance at village center. Dancers are costumed and wear iron bracelets  around their ankles.  A group of women are seen dancing at the far left hand side of the picture.

properties.title: Horn blower at a funeral
properties.abstract: Horn blower blowing his horn as he escorts one of the late speaker's son to his father's funeral. Back to camera is another man, also son of the deceased attending his father's funeral.

properties.title: Sons of ex-speaker of Sabo standing beside grave
properties.abstract: Sons of the late speaker of Sabo standing beside the grave for their father. Note man aiming gun into air to fire salute.

properties.title: Burial of ex-speaker of Sabo
properties.abstract: Ex-speaker of Sabo being buried by relatives and sympathizers.

properties.title: Dancers performing at funeral
properties.abstract: Dancers performing at funeral. Some of the people in the picture are wearing panama hats.

properties.title: Elders exchanging greetings
properties.abstract: Elders exchanging greetings as event gains momentum.

properties.title: Children entertaining crowd at village center
properties.abstract: Children entertaining crowd at village center. Elsewhere in the picture is a group of adults and elders.

properties.title: Crowd gathers at shade structure
properties.abstract: People gather at the temporary structure on the right, built to provide shade and protection from rain.

properties.title: Ceremonial dancers pose in costumes
properties.abstract: Ceremonial dancers pose as dancing continues in background.

properties.title: Portrait of a ceremonial dancer
properties.abstract: Dancer posing in his traditional costume.

properties.title: Dancing at village center
properties.abstract: Dancers entertaining themselves at village center.

properties.title: Elder acknowledging a dancer
properties.abstract: Elder acknowledging a male dancer as women dance also.

properties.title: Ceremonial dancers with spectators
properties.abstract: Ceremonial dancers joined by spectators at village center.

properties.title: Ceremonial dancers joined by spectators
properties.abstract: Dancers performing at village center.

properties.title: Musician and dancers perform
properties.abstract: Dancers including a horn blower performing. The horn blower has blackened his face. The male dancer wearing a Panama hat is holding a long curved knife. The female dancer is also holding a knife.

properties.title: Rubber tappers' camp on Division 6 - Cavalla - 1 of 4
properties.abstract: View of labor village on Division 6. At the right is the Assembly of God 'church-house.'

properties.title: Surf boat fishing on Hoffman River, Harper
properties.abstract: Surf boat fishing on Hoffman River as children stand at the bank of the river watching. Parked close to where the children are standing are wooden canoes.

properties.title: Fanti fishing boats on Hoffman River, Harper
properties.abstract: Fanti fishing boats on Hoffman River, Harper.

properties.title: Labor Village in Division 6
properties.abstract: View of labor village on Division 6.

properties.title: Children pretending to apply new coat to mud house
properties.abstract: Children pretending to apply new coat to mud house.  Note newly applied gray coating.

properties.title: Man looking over a cleared plot in forest
properties.abstract: Unidentified man and site.  Khaki shirt and pants may indicate he is a government employee or solder.  Site appears to be marked off with building poles in background.

properties.title: Women walking through village
properties.abstract: Women walking towards cluster of houses. Behind the houses are tall trees and crops, including plantain and or banana. Young girl looks at photographer.

properties.title: Contact Sheet #5 of 5
properties.abstract: Location of negatives unknown.  Scans made from positive images.

properties.title: Contact Sheet #1 of 5
properties.abstract: Location of negatives unknown.  Scans made from positive images.

properties.title: Men repairing road
properties.abstract: Supervisor supervising road repair work. The road is possibly used to transport timber logs, some of which are loaded on the truck in the picture.

properties.title: People seated in shade under thatched roof
properties.abstract: Group of people including men, women and children relaxing on the veranda of mud house roofed with thatch. In front of the children (boys) are three drums which they possibly play to entertain people who usually use the place for their relaxation. At the

properties.title: McEvoy Research Vehicle
properties.abstract: McEvoy's research van at the outskirt of a village. Broad leaved plants in the background are banana plants interspersed with trees.

properties.title: Family portrait in village
properties.abstract: Portrait of Thomas Baker, Sabo migrant worker, and family taken in front of a thatched "kitchen."" Coconut palms are in the background."

properties.title: Domestic dog on a timber log
properties.abstract: Dog walking on a huge log.

properties.title: Tchien motor road through forest
properties.abstract: Tchien motor road scenery.

properties.title: Gwen & Karen's play village
properties.abstract: Gwen and Karen McEvoy's play village consisting of mini-house frames.

properties.title: Large mud house roofed with thatch
properties.abstract: Large mud house roofed with thatch. Note forest products such as palm nuts drying on large rock or earthen pile.

properties.title: Rural Village
properties.abstract: Village of mud houses roofed with thatch surrounded by forest and farms. A man walking into the village on a path.

properties.title: Monkey hanging from branch in man's hand
properties.abstract: Monkey hanging from branch in man's hand. Palm tree stump directly behind monkey.

properties.title: Men working at a construction site
properties.abstract: Men working at a construction site. Behind the men is a timber truck loaded with timber. Note Caucasian man standing in middle.

properties.abstract: Location of negatives unknown.  Scans made from positive images.

properties.abstract: River running through a forest.

properties.abstract: Location of negatives unknown.  Scans made from positive images.

properties.title: A man working on a burnt plantation
properties.abstract: Man holding a gun standing on edge of forest.

properties.title: Village center
properties.abstract: Cluster of houses around village center

properties.title: Man boarding a commercial vehicle
properties.abstract: Young man boarding a taxi. The vehicle is loaded with luggage. Some are personal belongings of the passengers; some bags are full of agricultural products to be sold in larger markets.

properties.title: Fanti fishing canoes
properties.abstract: Fanti fishing canoes beached along river. A group of fishermen mending their nets near Hoffman River.

properties.title: Portrait of ritual performers
properties.abstract: Ritual performers. The one in the middle is wearing a bearded mask.

properties.title: Two women with baby
properties.abstract: (Near Duplicate)

properties.title: Women clearing brush for a rice farm
properties.abstract: Female laborers working on a farm. They are clearing bushes to be burnt so that planting to take place.

properties.title: Woman working in front of house
properties.abstract: Woman doing domestic tasks in front of a house on the Firestone Plantation, Division 6 camp.

properties.title: Woman chopping fuel wood
properties.abstract: Woman cutting wood with an ax on cleared land.

properties.title: Collapsed thatched roof "kitchen"""
properties.abstract: Collapsed thatched roof "kitchen."" Roof was originally supported by poles with no exterior mud walls."

properties.title: "Kitchen"" on land cleared for rice farming"
properties.abstract: Land cleared and burned for farming purposes. In middle is a low-built shelter or "kitchen"" with forest behind it."

properties.title: A large and a small boat along Liberian coast
properties.abstract: A large boat carrying about ten people and a small boat paddled by one person. Breaking waves indicate the ocean.

properties.title: Cluster of mud houses
properties.abstract: Cluster of mud houses.

properties.title: View of village edge
properties.abstract: Village showing inhabitants walking to daily activities.

properties.title: Portrait of George Ireland and his family
properties.abstract: Portrait of George Ireland, interpreter, of Ghaepo district, Kaweaken, and his family.

properties.title: Women mudding McEvoy's house
properties.abstract: Women mudding the walls of McEvoy's newly built house house.

properties.title: Land clearing and burning
properties.abstract: Clearing and burning of Tweh's farm possibly in preparation for the planting season.

properties.title: Auto mechanic inspecting damaged vehicle
properties.abstract: An auto mechanic inspecting damaged vehicle at Firestone Plantation Companies  garage in Harper. Damage to vehicle incurred during sea transit.

properties.title: Taxi in a forest area
properties.abstract: Car, probably a taxi, loaded with luggage on top and parked close to edge of forest.

properties.title: Road construction
properties.abstract: A bulldozer clearing a site possibly for road construction.

properties.title: New Speaker of Sebo at predecessor's funeral
properties.abstract: New Speaker of Sebo consoling mourners on the day of his predecessor's funeral.

properties.title: Old sacred pot
properties.abstract: Photo labeled "old sacred pot"""

properties.abstract: View of labor village in Division 6.

properties.title: Bluker cutters on Division 2 clearing roadside vegitation
properties.abstract: Bluker (vegetative overgrowth) cutters on Division 2 clearing roadside vegetation

properties.title: Harvesting rice
properties.abstract: Three men and a woman harvesting rice. The man on the immediate right (named Koro) is showing a head of rice he has just harvested. The man in the middle is named Tikli.

properties.title: Women's market near Sidike in Firestone Plantation, Cavalla
properties.abstract: Vehicle, probably a taxi, parked close to a women's market near Sidike in Cavalla (near duplicate).

properties.title: Woman plaiting girl's hair while Tapper waits to collect latex
properties.abstract: Residents of a labor village in Division 6.  young man is a tapper who has completed cutting his task, and is awaiting the time to collect latex. Woman is plaiting girls' hair.

properties.title: Village man selling small goods
properties.abstract: Man displaying his wares under the roof of a mud house. Items on display include boxes, buckets, and pieces of cloth.

properties.title: Assembly of God church house in Division 6
properties.abstract: Assembly of God church house in labor village on Division 6.

properties.title: Tapper collecting  latex
properties.abstract: Tapper collecting latex, Division 2. Note  fresh latex flows down the white diagonal grooves cut on the trees into a rubber collecting cup.

properties.title: Forest path with gate
properties.abstract: Forest path with fence and gate.

properties.title: Tappers carrying buckets full of latex
properties.abstract: Tappers at collection station of Firestone Plantation Company. They are carrying buckets loaded with latex.

properties.title: View of young rubber
properties.abstract: View across area of young rubber toward Drivers' Camp. On the edge of the village of company provided houses are additional 'country houses' which have been built by workers to shelter dependents for which there is insufficient housing in regular housing

properties.title: Constructing a house
properties.abstract: Men working on the roof of a house under construction. The wooden structure of the house has already been built and men have commenced the weaving of the thatch roofing. Stacked inside the wooden structure is a heap of leaves that could be used in the ma

properties.title: New Speaker of Sebo consoling sons of his predecessor at funeral
properties.abstract: New Speaker of Sebo consoling sons of his predecessor at the latter's funeral.

properties.title: Men dissecting wild game
properties.abstract: Men dissecting wild game. Standing behind the group is possibly a game warden. Also in the background is the forest where the men might have caught the animal.

properties.title: Man walking through the middle of village
properties.abstract: A man walking down the the middle of a village consisting of a number of mud houses with thatched roofs.

properties.title: Gibson, McEvoy's interpreter, on the right
properties.abstract: Gibson, McEvoy's interpreter, on the right

properties.title: Two tappers crossing log bridge in plantation
properties.abstract: Tappers crossing log bridge at Firestone Plantation, Cavalla. Workers carry buckets filled with latex in the swampy area of Division 2.

properties.title: Tropical Forest Clearing
properties.abstract: A forest with portions of it cleared possibly for farming purposes.

properties.title: Sky and Forest
properties.abstract: Sky and forest

properties.title: Female laborers
properties.abstract: Women from Driver's Camp on the way to morning market in the plantation town of Gedetarbo.

properties.title: Rubber tappers' camp on Division 6 - Cavalla - 4 of 4
properties.abstract: View of the labor village in Division 6. Duplicate

properties.title: Man and his daughter at Cavalla Plantation
properties.abstract: Unidentified worker with child in front of his house in Factory camp.

properties.title: Workers' families in Pahn Camp.
properties.abstract: Labor village in Division 4. The village is commonly called 'Pahn Camp' and is attributed to the great number of 'Pahn' people who are said to lived in the village over the years. At the time of the photo few tappers had yet returned from the day's work.

properties.title: Boy carrying bucket of latex among rubber trees
properties.abstract: Young boy carrying a bucket full of latex for older brother in a task in Division 2. Since so many boys and young men have learned the techniques of rubber production through kinship relations, the company no longer has its "tappers school."""

properties.title: Men working clearing vegetation along road
properties.abstract: Laborers cleaning the road margins. Walking along the road is a headman or overseer, followed by his son. In the background is the laborer' recreation hall.

properties.title: Children playing in school field near Gedetarbo
properties.abstract: Children playing in a school field near Gedetarbo, a town located near the center of the plantation.

properties.title: Women's market near Sidike in Firestone Plantation, Cavalla
properties.abstract: Women's market across the road from the Firestone Plantation's Division 1 offices. Since the division offices are located near the village of Sidike, the Division 1 labor village is referred to as "Sidike."" Women from the labor village participate in th

properties.title: Women and children going about their activities
properties.abstract: Women and children in clearing edged with banana trees

properties.title: Monkey hanging from branch in man's hand
properties.abstract: Monkey hanging from branch in man's hand. Palm  tree stump directly behind monkey.

properties.title: Payday market under trees at Cavalla
properties.abstract: The crowd of tappers, kinsmen, creditors, and hawkers at a payday market in Division 1.

properties.title: Karen and Gwen at the beach in Harper
properties.abstract: Karen and Gwen at beach, Harper.

properties.title: Supervisor and workers discussing work on rubber plantation
properties.abstract: Division superintendent, an expatriate Dutch planter, talking with two of his tappers in Division 6.

properties.title: Women carrying pots
properties.abstract: Portrait of two women carrying pots. In addition to the pots, one of them is seen carrying a baby at her side. The women are possibly going to or returning from the market.

properties.title: Hilda McEvoy tapping rubber at Cavalla, Division 2
properties.abstract: Hilda McEvoy demonstrates how rubber is extracted from a rubber tree in Division 2.

properties.title: Working in a rice field
properties.abstract: Three farmers, two men and a woman move through a rice field.

properties.title: People walking in village
properties.abstract: Man and children walking by a thatch roofed house.

properties.title: Young man at Tweh's farm
properties.abstract: Young man at Tweh's farm.ff

properties.title: Young rubber tappers at Cavalla
properties.abstract: Tappers (c. age 13) with buckets at Cavalla from Division 2. Rubber trees are seen in the background with black collecting cups attached. The latex collected is poured from the cups into a bucket such as the two shiny buckets in the foreground.

properties.title: People waiting by roadside with loads
properties.abstract: People waiting by roadside with loads, possibly for public transportation. Woman   is also attending to her baby. Lying close by are loaded sacks and a suitcase.

properties.title: Road repair works
properties.abstract: Men, including supervisors, busily repairing road while an bulldozer stands in readiness to level the ground. Also in the picture is a  truck being loaded with timber.

properties.title: Young men at Tweh's farm
properties.abstract: Young men at Tweh's farm. One of the men is carrying a head load. Rubber trees surround the clearing.

properties.title: Japo with freshly killed gazelle
properties.abstract: Japo kneeling over a freshly killed gazelle. In his right hand is machete or cutlass.

properties.title: Group portrait in village
properties.abstract: Portrait of two men and a woman taken at the back of a mud house. Standing nearby is another man who seemed to have taken advantage of the activity to position himself so as to be captured by the lenses of the camera.

properties.title: Truck traveling on a muddy road
properties.abstract: A tipper (dump) truck traveling on a muddy road running through the forest.

properties.title: Contact Sheet #3 of 5
properties.abstract: Location of negatives unknown.  Scans made from positive images.

properties.title: Sunlit clearing in forest
properties.abstract: Patch of sunlight on floor of forest

properties.title: Cluster of village houses
properties.abstract: Houses in a village

properties.title: Tapper payday near market
properties.abstract: Tappers from Division 1 are gathered to receive payment on payday. Market is in background under old, non-productive rubber trees.

properties.title: Tapper payday at Division 2
properties.abstract: Tappers from Division 2 gather at building to receive payment on payday.

properties.title: Elderly man talking to children
properties.abstract: Elderly man talking to children in village center.

properties.title: Man standing under a broad thatch roof
properties.abstract: A man standing at the entrance of a house roofed with broad thatch. House is surrounded by food-producing plants and trees, which has created a canopy on the compound.

properties.title: Children running  through village
properties.abstract: Three children running through village. Forest is in the background.

properties.title: Portrait of two men
properties.abstract: Portrait of two men taken at the back of a house.

properties.title: Man carrying child on forest path
properties.abstract: A man carrying a child leads several other people on a forest path. Child is probably anthropologist's daughter.

properties.title: Mechanics in Harper inspect damaged vehicle during sea transit.
properties.abstract: Mechanics in Harper inspect vehicle damaged during sea transit.

properties.title: Gwen and Karen McEvoy carrying headloads
properties.abstract: Gwen and Karen McEvoy, daughters of the American anthropologist, carrying head loads, probably pieces of firewood.

properties.title: Woman harvesting fuel wood
properties.abstract: Woman working in a area where trees and vegetation have been cleared and burned to prepare for a rice farming. Coming towards her is another woman carrying a baby on her right shoulder.

properties.title: Driver's camp, Division 2, from Old Hospital camp
properties.abstract: View is across recently planted rubber trees, looking from "Old Hospital Camp"" toward ""Driver's Camp"" in Division 2."

properties.title: East Camp, a labor village in Division 2
properties.abstract: View of labor village on Division 2. This village is called "East Camp."" Building at left is a ""church house"" constructed by workers who belong to Assembly of God church. The mat structures are bath houses."

properties.title: Dancing at village center
properties.abstract: Group dancing at village center. Also in the picture is a man dancing with his staff as other men seating on a bench look on.

properties.title: Carpenter making casket
properties.abstract: Carpenter making a casket (coffin) as others look on.

properties.title: Woman pouring cocoa beans on mat to dry
properties.abstract: Woman drying what looks like cocoa beans on a mat spread on the floor while girl talks to her.

properties.title: Men weaving rattan palms
properties.abstract: Men weaving rattan palms at site of an unfinished house.  May be used for thatching roof or fencing material. (Near duplicate)

properties.title: Man spreading grains on a mat
properties.abstract: Man spreading grains on a mat as children look on.

properties.title: Children at the beach
properties.abstract: Children spending time at the beach, Harper.

properties.title: Ceremonial dancers continue dancing
properties.abstract: Ceremonial dancers dancing. May be part of funeral rites for departed ex-speaker of Sabo.

properties.title: Children at the beach
properties.abstract: Children and an adult female at the beach. Coconut trees in the background on the beach.

properties.title: Cleared land
properties.abstract: Land cleared possibly for farming. This newly cut vegetation will be burned to prepare it for tilling and planting, possibly rice.

properties.title: Young girl poses as villagers watch
properties.abstract: Anthropologist McEvoy's daughter poses while villagers look on.

properties.title: Rocky Atlantic Ocean coastline
properties.abstract: Portrait of rocky coastline.

properties.title: People walking on a road
properties.abstract: People walking on a road with cluster of houses along it.

properties.title: Men climbing raffia palm
properties.abstract: Men climbing raffia tree to harvest the palm fronds. Raffia is the fibrous inner layer of the palm frond removed to make ropes for tying and weaving, for costumes and decorations. Fronds can also be used to thatch roofs. (Similar to VAB6943-0033)

properties.title: Men climbing raffia palm
properties.abstract: Men climbing raffia tree to harvest the palm fronds. Raffia is the fibrous inner layer of the palm frond removed to make ropes for tying and weaving, for costumes and decorations. Fronds can also be used to thatch roofs. (Similar to VAB6943-0032)

properties.title: Men watching burning vegetation while clearing a farm
properties.abstract: Two men watching burning brush in cleared area of tropical forest. When ready the land will be used for farming, likely for rice.

properties.title: Men stand by while burning off vegetation
properties.abstract: Man and a woman observing a burnt field cleared of brush and other vegetation for farming.

properties.title: Researcher's parked van sits in rain
properties.abstract: Researcher's parked van sits in rain.

properties.title: Bush burning to clear agricultural land
properties.abstract: Bush burning possibly to prepare land for farming.

properties.title: Tchien motor road
properties.abstract: Tchien motor road scenery.  Note woman walking on road and reddish color of the laterite soil.

properties.title: Cleared land
properties.abstract: Land cleared by cutting and burning bush for the cultivation of crops.

properties.title: People observing a cleared field.
properties.abstract: Two men and a woman watch burning of brush to clear field. The palm tree standing on the land was not affected by the fire.

properties.title: A crowd watching something of interest in the village
properties.abstract: A crowd observing person or activity. A young woman at center right is pounding palm nuts in mortar.

properties.title: Boys play in forest stream
properties.abstract: Boys play in forest stream.

properties.title: Women carrying head loads along road
properties.abstract: Women carrying loads as they walk with two children. Note reddish laterite soil of the Tchien motor road.

properties.title: Children playing as adults look on
properties.abstract: Children playing in a compound as adults look on.

properties.title: Cassava being cooked in Division 2
properties.abstract: Family cooking cassava in the morning on Firestone Plantation, Div. 2.

properties.title: Children and adults in village
properties.abstract: Children and adults in village appear to be waiting for something, perhaps musicians.

properties.title: Women and children going about their activities
properties.abstract: Group of young people including children watching an unidentified activity. In the distance are women preparing food.

properties.title: Resting on the farm
properties.abstract: People including women, children and a man, resting in shade of a clearing on a farm.

properties.title: Village children at play
properties.abstract: Village children at play at village center while some adults look on.

properties.title: Researcher's family walks on rural Tchien motor road
properties.abstract: Woman and a girl walking on Tchien motor road running through the forest.

properties.title: Sawyer cutting tree
properties.abstract: A sawyer cutting timber. He is standing on a make-shift ladder supported by a tree stump.

properties.title: Sawyer at work
properties.abstract: A sawyer standing on a three-legged platform as he cuts the tree.

properties.title: Hilda, Gwen, and Karen McEvoy
properties.abstract: Hilda, Gwen, and Karen McEvoy standing on fallen tree.

properties.title: Group of people spending time together
properties.abstract: A group of people including a child in helmet  in front of a wooden structure.

properties.title: River running through  forest
properties.abstract: A river running through the forest.

properties.title: Cat and  monkey eating from  same bowl
properties.abstract: A cat and a monkey eating together.

properties.title: Two adults in bush
properties.abstract: Two people looking for something in the bush, perhaps food.

properties.title: Man sharpening a knife on farm
properties.abstract: A man sharpening a knife as women watch. On the tree hangs a water bottle and a twin-lens camera for 120 roll film, probably the researcher's.

properties.title: Mud houses with thatched roofs
properties.abstract: Two mud houses roofed with thatch. One of the houses has people in front of it.

properties.title: Portrait in the middle of a road
properties.abstract: Women and children standing by a bridge over a flooding stream.

properties.title: Child walking away from house with van
properties.abstract: Caucasian child walking on road. Behind him is a van parked in front of a house.

properties.title: Men weaving rattan palms
properties.abstract: Men weaving rattan palms at site of an unfinished house.  May be used for thatching roof or fencing material.

properties.title: Burnt field after clearing
properties.abstract: Burnt field with some tall trees standing on it. Land will be farmed for food, probably rice.

properties.title: Costumed dancers parading through village center
properties.abstract: Costumed dancers parading through village center. Some villagers have joined the procession while the seated men in the foreground look on.

properties.title: Man inspecting a burnt field
properties.abstract: Man inspecting a burnt field. Standing at one edge of the field are tall trees which were not consumed by the fire that was used to clear the heavy vegetation.

properties.title: People congregate on road

properties.title: Portrait at a village center
properties.abstract: Two men and a woman pose in front of a mud house roofed with thatch.

properties.title: Children playing on dirt road
properties.abstract: Children playing on the field while Caucasian child looks on.

properties.title: People walking in cleared field.
properties.abstract: Men and women on field in cleared by fire in tropical forest. Position of women and clothes of man in lead suggest some kind of ceremony or dedication might be under

properties.abstract: Masquerades and spectators dancing in front of a house.
